title: 5.8 black cleaver update.
body: Do any of you plan on trying on Black Cleaver on any of your champs because of the update?  I think I might try building it on irelia.

replies.body:
It's going to be pretty damn op.

It's build path with passives make no sense though. It should be phage/Brut

It's pretty good on Quinn.

She needs damage early and really likes the rage passive from phage. The extra health and CDR helps her as well. 
Really evens out her build-pathing imo. 

Phage is a really good item on her, and the problem of it only building into Trinity (not a good first buy on a champ with only bonus AD ratios and long cooldowns) before has finally been changed.

I imagine Riot will nerf the CDR from 20% to 10% like they did with Spirit Visage. It will still be a good item.

GP is probably a good candidate for the new BC as well, along with the obvious Garen and Darius.
Wukong ult I'm really want to prove that.
Looking forward to trying it on Renekton and Skarner.
I'm gonna try it on nasus just for fun.

To be honest, I'm going to be replacing LW with it on my fighters, since League of Tanks.

I wouldn't build it on ADCs, though, since it's likely someone on your team will be building it anyways. There's also the fact that armor reduction applies before armor penetration, and it would effectively make LW penetrate less armor. It's best to just leave it to someone who can easily apply the debuff and still get a dps increase on it.
I'll be playing it on Garen (obviously), but based on how well it works I'll see who else I can try it out on.  Without testing it Hecarim and Trundle come to mind.
Pretty much all of them. Maybe some adcs like ashe. Lost early game power but it gains a lot more in the long run so it'll be fun to try it on everyone at least once.
